name: Vice Dice Mobile
description:
Ever raged at a board game? Time to do that digitally  :D 

  • For the lovers of breaking phones
  • Platformers 
  • AND diiiice rolling

You came to the right place! Where we combine the three to visualize insanity!

Play whenever you are angry to become angrier OR when calm to regret your decisions ;)

A short experience you wish you had  passed on!
